statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={5.7} , \displaystyle{b}={8.1}, \displaystyle{c}={10.5}, and \displaystyle{d}={12.1}, with diagonal from first to third point \displaystyle{e}={10.3}. Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
